# ReplaceSymbolEffect.MagicReplace

**Structure**

A symbol effect applies the MagicReplace animation to symbol images.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MagicReplace
```

## Overview

The MagicReplace effect animates common elements across symbol images.

## Instance Properties

- **configuration**: The configuration for the effect.

## Conforms To

- ContentTransitionSymbolEffect
- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SymbolEffect
title: ReplaceSymbolEffect.MagicReplace
